title: Honor
body:
Well, I have been honor level 2, at check point 1, for a few weeks now, i have been trying and trying, getting honors. I haven't gone up in checkpoint. I'd like to participate in the PBE but I can't due to the sheer fact that I cant level up my honor, my last game i got 3 honors. I havent gotten a lot but i've gotten some, i do think that honor checkpoints should be easier to go to. Any one know why my honor check point hasn't gone up?
IGN: GrandTheiftAuto5
|
|
{{champion:75}}

replies.body: your honor hasent gone up because riot dosent want your honor to go up
